general: NORTSO, Norway. Solo team ran by a senior software engineer. Also running a tool on nortso.xyz to analyze data on FlrFinance
infrastructure: NORTSO, 1 node on Songbird and 2 nodes on Flare (1 observation node and 1 to be validation). I intend to expand the infrastructure when we can run real validators. Current expenses are about 750 USD/month
safeguards: NORTSO, There are multiple safeguards. The most important ones are depegging of stablecoins exchange feed issues
availability: NORTSO, STSO: April 2022, FTSO: July 2022. Availability is close to 100%. Usually solved by just restarting the provider
selling: NORTSO, FTSO: Sold nothing, STSO: Swapping 50% to CAND on the FlrFinance dex and donated to FlrLoans. The other half have been swapped to EXFI
tooling: NORTSO, providing a tool on nortso.xyz that lets users analyze their peformance in the FlrFinance ecosystem
